name: Defending Mars
description:
Defending Mars is the result of a weekend game jam, as part of our endeavor of reviving Potatoes Games as a game creator.

A simple 2D, pixel art, shooting game in the style of Space Invaders and Tyrian.

"In the year 2223, humanity has colonized Mars with the help of the brave entrepreneur Melon Tusk. Now some pesky aliens are attacking the colony, and it’s up to you to defend it. Good luck!"
